column5: I know its still early - but any word on the Gouin water level ?Heading up in 2 weeks ThanksTodd.
One thing is for certain you will not have to worry about low water which is big problem on that body of water.
Do you know what the water level is currently? Thxs for any info.
That's pretty cool, would you share the website where you found that image? Thanks!

First of all, thanks to Andre for sharing that great link. Secondly, tshea... keep us up to date on the water level upon your return, it would be appreciated. Any other useful updates or stories would be nice as well. I am hoping that the water levels aren't low like last year, it really changed our pike fishing strategy and was even a little dangerous running the boat. Hope this week is a great experience for you tshea. kegisfly
